name: The Journey To The Gates (DEMO)
description:
Hello! This is my first ever game that I have put time and effort into that didn't turn out to be hot garbage. (Hopefully) 

"Journey To The Gates" is a somewhat short RPG about a citizen of a broken society setting out to harness the power of 4 corrupt leaders.  Follow the adventures of Vincent Kayman as he sets out to discover the inner workings of what is determining the rules that society has to follow.

(Keep in mind that so far this game has been made with RPG Maker MZ's default assets, so it is not the best at the moment.)
